original: ma h'a tsanda be ga aa mo gha ku la sa ma ya padma h'um h'um/
analyzed: ma h'a tsanda be ga aa mo gha ku la sa ma ya padma h'um h'um/
translated: Maha chanda vega amogha kula samaya padma hum hum.

analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po don yod zhags pa'i padma gtsug tor gyi snying po'o //

original: de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams su 'gyur te /
translated: Then, the activities of Amoghasiddhi will occur.

analyzed: dran pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pas gcig tu mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely remembering, one will be equal to all the tathāgatas of the three times, and will become one with them.

original: tshe dpag med dang mnyam pa'i lus su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe dpag med dang mnyam pa'i lus su 'gyur ro //
translated: One will have a body equal to Amitāyus.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be equal to all the tathāgatas of all the buddhafields of the ten directions.

original: mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ngo //
analyzed: mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ngo //
translated: One will see all the tathāgatas as equal and the same.

original: padma'i phyag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / padma'i gtsug tor gyi phyag gis 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: padma'i phyag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / padma'i gtsug tor gyi phyag gis 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: By the samādhi of Padma­hasta, and by the mudrā of Padma-uṣṇīṣa, one will become equal to Lokeśvara.

analyzed: padma'i gtsug tor bcings pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i gtsug tu mngon par dbang bskur na /
translated: By merely binding the Padma-uṣṇīṣa, if one is consecrated on the crown of the head,

analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ro //
translated: He is empowered by all the Tathāgatas of the three times.

original: padma'i gtsug tor gyis don yod par dbang bskur ba @58a *//
analyzed: padma'i gtsug tor gyis don yod par dbang bskur ba @58a *//
translated: He is empowered by the lotus uṣṇīṣa.

original: gang yin pa de /
analyzed: gang yin pa de /
translated: He is the one who is

original: padma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po rgyas par gyur pa thob ste /
analyzed: padma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po rgyas par gyur pa thob ste /
translated: endowed with the essence of the expanded lotus uṣṇīṣa.

original: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang / bla na med pa'i dpal 'thob bo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang / bla na med pa'i dpal 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the samādhi of a hundred thousand and the unsurpassed glory.

original: rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa padma'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du rigs kyi rgyal po legs par grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa padma'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du rigs kyi rgyal po legs par grub par 'gyur te /
translated: The expanded king of the family’s mantra is the lotus uṣṇīṣa maṇḍala. The king of the family is well accomplished.

original: thams cad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub bzang po rnams 'ong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub bzang po rnams 'ong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Everywhere the excellent accomplishments of the king of the family come.

original: rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do //
translated: The king of the family’s king of mantras and the king of awareness mantras grant all the supreme accomplishments.

original: padmo'i phyag gis rjes su 'jug cing /
analyzed: padmo'i phyag gis rjes su 'jug cing /
translated: He is followed by the lotus-handed one.

original: don yod pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub ste /
analyzed: don yod pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub ste /
translated: One will accomplish the powers of the Amogha family just as they are.

original: bklags pas grub pa 'di la the tshom med do //🔽padma gtsug tor gyi rigs kyi dngos grub dang / padma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram /
analyzed: bklags pas grub pa 'di la the tshom med do // padma gtsug tor gyi rigs kyi dngos grub dang / padma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram /
translated: There is no doubt that one will be accomplished by mere recitation.🔽One will accomplish the powers of the Padma Uṣṇīṣa family and the Maṇḍala of the Vast Lotus

original: don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du bklags nas bzlas ba tsam gyis 'grub ste /
analyzed: don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du bklags nas bzlas ba tsam gyis 'grub ste /
translated: or the Amoghapaśa Maṇḍala by mere recitation.

original: rigs kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: One will become a lord of all the kings of families and kings of awareness.

original: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs thun mong pa thams cad du rgyal po'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs thun mong pa thams cad du rgyal po'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will perform the duties of a king in all the common families of all the bodhisattvas, by means of the detailed rites of the maṇḍalas and the seals.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang / @58b gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang / @58b gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyur ro //
translated: One will become a king in the thousands of buddhafields, in the hundreds of buddhafields, and in the buddhafields equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: rigs kyi rig pas lha'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i tshogs rnams kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi rig pas lha'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i tshogs rnams kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: By the knowledge of the family, one will become the lord of the gods and the lord of the hosts of gods.

original: rtag tu yang gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams su gyur pa dang / dri za rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang dbang phyug tu rtag tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtag tu yang gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams su gyur pa dang / dri za rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang dbang phyug tu rtag tu 'gyur te /
translated: Always one will become the king and lord of the yakṣas, rākṣasas, gandharvas, and kumbhāṇḍas.

original: the tshom med do /
analyzed: the tshom med do /
translated: There is no doubt.

original: nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams dang / thams cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar du rigs kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams dang / thams cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar du rigs kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
translated: One will become the king of the garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas, and in all ways one will be the king of the family until one reaches enlightenment.

original: de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang / drag po de yid la sems pa tsam gyi mod la 'phral du ri rab ltung bar byed cing /
analyzed: de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang / drag po de yid la sems pa tsam gyi mod la 'phral du ri rab ltung bar byed cing /
translated: Then, merely by remembering the king of wrathful ones, merely by thinking of him, the mountain Sumeru will instantly fall down.

original: khor yug gi ri rnam par 'thor bar byed do //
analyzed: khor yug gi ri rnam par 'thor bar byed do //
translated: The Cakravāḍa mountains will be scattered.

original: rgya mtsho chen po kun nas dkrug cing rgya mtsho chen po nye bar skye bar byed do //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po kun nas dkrug cing rgya mtsho chen po nye bar skye bar byed do //
translated: He agitates the great ocean and causes the great ocean to arise.

original: kun tu gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: kun tu gsal bar byed do //
translated: He illuminates everywhere.

original: klu'i gnas thams cad du klu'i gnas 'bar bar yang byed do //
analyzed: klu'i gnas thams cad du klu'i gnas 'bar bar yang byed do //
translated: He also causes the abodes of the nāgas to blaze in all the abodes of the nāgas.

original: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis steng du bdug par byed do //
analyzed: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis steng du bdug par byed do //
translated: He fumigates above all the obstacles and misleaders in an instant.

original: gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gza' dang / brjed byed dang / mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gza' dang / brjed byed dang / mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: All those yakṣas, rākṣasas, bhūtas, grahas, apasmāras, and aśanis become frightened by merely remembering the Lord of Wrath.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang ba pa thams cad kyi rigs @59a *//
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang ba pa thams cad kyi rigs @59a *//
translated: The Lord of Wrath is the secret of all the families.

original: kyi dam tshig la gnas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya gnas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: kyi dam tshig la gnas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya gnas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do //
translated: And all the deities of secret mantra, merely by recalling the King of Wrathful Ones, will go for refuge to the vidyādhara.

original: de rnams thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing gnas par byed do //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing gnas par byed do //
translated: They will all follow and abide by his every command.

original: 'ga' zhig gang du 'gro ba'am 'dug pa de la dbang po dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rjes dang / chu lha dang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gang du 'gro ba'am 'dug pa de la dbang po dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rjes dang / chu lha dang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang /
translated: Whether he goes or stays, Indra, the gods of the three realms, Brahmā, Viṣṇu, Maheśvara, Yama, Varuṇa, the nāga king Sāgara, Nanda,

original: nye dga' bo dang / gzhon nu dang / sde dpon dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dus rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang bar byed do //
analyzed: nye dga' bo dang / gzhon nu dang / sde dpon dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dus rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang bar byed do //
translated: Upananda, Kumāra, the generals, and likewise the Four Great Kings will always follow the vidyādhara.

original: the tshom med do //
analyzed: the tshom med do //
translated: There is no doubt.

original: khros pa'i las rnams sam /
analyzed: khros pa'i las rnams sam /
translated: Or the wrathful actions.

original: de bzhin du drag po'i las rnams thams cad kyang h'um yig tsam gyis de la dngos grub mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du drag po'i las rnams thams cad kyang h'um yig tsam gyis de la dngos grub mthong ngo //
translated: Likewise, all the fierce actions are accomplished by the mere syllable hūṃ.

original: phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / sems can ma rungs pa shin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'jigs pa dang / rnam par 'gras pa'i skye bo dang / sdig pa de rnams thams cad h'um yig gis mchog tu gzir ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / sems can ma rungs pa shin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'jigs pa dang / rnam par 'gras pa'i skye bo dang / sdig pa de rnams thams cad h'um yig gis mchog tu gzir ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the enemies, the wicked beings, the extremely terrible ones, the armies of the enemy, the fearful ones, the hostile people, and all those evildoers are reduced to ashes by the mere supreme intimidation of the syllable hūṃ.

original: sdang ba dang / ngan sems pa'i sems can dang / byas pa @59b mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la 'khon pa thams cad drag po'i h'um yig bzlas pa tsam gyis skad cig la sreg ste /
analyzed: sdang ba dang / ngan sems pa'i sems can dang / byas pa @59b mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la 'khon pa thams cad drag po'i h'um yig bzlas pa tsam gyis skad cig la sreg ste /
translated: All the hateful, ill-willed beings, the ungrateful, and those who bear grudges are burned up in an instant by the mere recitation of the fierce syllable hūṃ.

original: dper na mes phye ma leb bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mes phye ma leb bzhin no //
translated: For example, like a moth by fire.

original: las gzhan stong phrag rnams dang / las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste /
analyzed: las gzhan stong phrag rnams dang / las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste /
translated: Thousands of other actions and hundreds of thousands of actions are accomplished by the mere recitation.

original: dran pa tsam gyi mdo la las thams cad 'grub bo //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyi mdo la las thams cad 'grub bo //
translated: By merely remembering it, all activities are accomplished.

original: de nas don yod pa padma'i gtsug tor dran pa tsam gyis bya ba thams cad ni /
analyzed: de nas don yod pa padma'i gtsug tor dran pa tsam gyis bya ba thams cad ni /
translated: Then, by merely remembering the Amoghapāśa uṣṇīṣa, all activities

original: gnyis su 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyis su 'gyur te /
translated: are twofold.

original: ji ltar gang cung zad yid la byed pas las byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar gang cung zad yid la byed pas las byed do //
translated: Whatever one mentally engages in, one performs the activities.

original: dkyil 'khor ram /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ram /
translated: In the maṇḍala,

original: gnas rnams pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do //
analyzed: gnas rnams pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do //
translated: or in all other places, one performs all activities as mentally engaged.

analyzed: zhes so // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga bzhi ba mo'i rgyal po /
translated: The King of the Four-Part Ritual of the Noble Amoghapāśa

original: bam po bco lnga pa /
analyzed: bam po bco lnga pa /
translated: Fifteenth section

original: de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgongs pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgongs pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: Next, the fulfillment of all intentions of those engaged in mantra will occur.

original: aom zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa padma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa padma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o //
translated: The one-syllable mantra of the Amoghapāśa uṣṇīṣa maṇḍala is oṃ.

original: 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na /
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na /
translated: If one recites it a hundred thousand times in front of the Lord of the World,

analyzed: sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will attain the first bhūmi.

original: sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur /
analyzed: sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur /

original: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //🔽don thams @60a *//
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro // don thams @60a *//
translated: One will attain all powers.

original: cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: All goals will be accomplished.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la /

analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad do //

analyzed: gsang sngags aom zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will go to the Sukhāvatī world system after death.

original: gsang sngags kyi yi ge gcig pa'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi yi ge gcig pa'o //
translated: This is the single syllable of the mantra.🔽“oṃ bhuḥ”

original: aom bhu / yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: aom bhu / yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: By reciting the two syllables a hundred thousand times,

original: sa gnyis pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa gnyis pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will attain the second bhūmi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad /

original: sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad /

original: sngon gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur /
analyzed: sngon gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur /
translated: He will be cured of his previous illness.

original: nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be under the control of the son of the lord of wealth, Maṇibhadra, and will be close to him.

original: mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur /
translated: No human being will be able to create obstacles for him again.

original: tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur /
translated: After his death, he will be reborn on the Potala mountain.

original: don yod pa'i zhigs pa'i dngos rgub kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don yod pa'i zhigs pa'i dngos rgub kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will obtain the accomplishment of Amogha.

original: aom padme / gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: aom padme / gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: Oṃ padme. If one recites the three-syllable mantra one hundred thousand times,

original: sa gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: he will enter the third bhūmi.

original: rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: By merely applying it, one will attain the great power, the vast power that is manifest to all worlds.

original: sgrub pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa'i cho ga rmongs pa chen po'i cho ga 'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa'i cho ga rmongs pa chen po'i cho ga 'o //
translated: This is the rite of the great delusion, the rite of the unsurpassed power of accomplishment.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the maṇḍala will be explained.

original: de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i padma gtsug tor gyi dngos grub dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid bla na med pa 'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i padma gtsug tor gyi dngos grub dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid bla na med pa 'o //
translated: This is the unsurpassed reality of the power of accomplishment, the power of accomplishment of the uṣṇīṣa of the Amoghapaśa Lotus, and the unsurpassed reality of the power of all vidyādharas.

original: dang por sdig pa zad par byed pa de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa /
analyzed: dang por sdig pa zad par byed pa de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa /
translated: all desired accomplishments,🔽the unsurpassed accomplishment of the inexhaustible,🔽the accomplishment of mantra,🔽the supreme accomplishment,🔽the accomplishment of attaining dhāraṇī,

original: 'dod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sngags kyi dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub dang / gzungs thob pa'i dngos grub rnams dang / sa bcu la rab tu 'jug par byed pa grub pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sngags kyi dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub dang / gzungs thob pa'i dngos grub rnams dang / sa bcu la rab tu 'jug par byed pa grub pa /
translated: the accomplishment of entering the ten grounds,🔽the means of accomplishing buddhahood,

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs de kho na nyid mthong ba rmad du byung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs de kho na nyid mthong ba rmad du byung ba /
translated: the marvelous seeing of reality,

original: byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byed pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byed pa /
translated: the means of approaching the site of enlightenment,

original: rdo rje gdan gyi gnas su yang dag par lhag par gnas pa /
analyzed: rdo rje gdan gyi gnas su yang dag par lhag par gnas pa /
translated: the perfect abiding at the site of Vajra Seat,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa /
translated: the turning of the wheel of Dharma,

original: bdud 'joms shing tshar @85b gcod pa /
analyzed: bdud 'joms shing tshar @85b gcod pa /
translated: the vanquishing and destroying of Māra,

original: bgegs thams cad lhung bar byed pa /
analyzed: bgegs thams cad lhung bar byed pa /
translated: the casting down of all obstructors,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gnas mthong bar byed pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gnas mthong bar byed pa /
translated: the seeing of the site of the buddhafield,🔽and the accomplishment of the supreme.

original: de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas dang mnyam pa /
analyzed: de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas dang mnyam pa /
translated: It is the same as the place of the consecration of all the tathāgatas,

original: sems can thams cad dang thun mong pa 'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dang thun mong pa 'o //
translated: and it is the common place of all sentient beings.

original: de nas po ta la ka'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas /
analyzed: de nas po ta la ka'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas /
translated: Then, the place that is the same as the palace of Potala,

original: don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas; skad cig la mnar med pa'i gnas dang / mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyong bar byed pa /
analyzed: don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas; skad cig la mnar med pa'i gnas dang / mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyong bar byed pa /
translated: the place of Amoghapaśa Avalokiteśvara, which in an instant purifies the place of Avīci and the five acts of immediate retribution,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas dang mnyam pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas dang mnyam pa /
translated: is the same as the secret place of all the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i gnas /
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i gnas /
translated: In the same way, the supreme family of all the buddhas, the place of the bodhisattvas,

original: de bzhin du rdo rje snying po'i dge ba 'phel ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub dang / de bzhin du padma'i rigs dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs dang / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje snying po'i dge ba 'phel ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub dang / de bzhin du padma'i rigs dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs dang / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub dang /
translated: in the same way, the increase of the virtue of the vajra essence, the attainment of the knowledge-mantra of the tathāgata family, and in the same way, the padma family, and in the same way, the maṇi family, and in the same way, the vajra family,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gcig pur zhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i gnas /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gcig pur zhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i gnas /
translated: The supreme mandala is the sole entry into the principal deity of the mandala, the great Mount Meru.

original: de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po lta bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas thams cad du son pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po lta bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas thams cad du son pa /
translated: It is the supreme place, like the great ocean, which is the supreme place that has arrived everywhere.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog rab tu sbyin pa /
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog rab tu sbyin pa /
translated: It is the supreme wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa'i gnas /
analyzed: dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa'i gnas /
translated: It is the place that is like the wish-fulfilling tree.

original: yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /🔽re ba @86a *//
analyzed: yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa / re ba @86a *//
translated: It is the place that fulfills all the wishes of the mind.

original: phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i gnas /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i gnas /
translated: It is the place that fulfills all hopes.

original: thams cad du mchog sbyin pa po 'di ni /
analyzed: thams cad du mchog sbyin pa po 'di ni /
translated: It is the supreme giver of everything.

original: byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gnas te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gnas te /
translated: It is the place of the seed of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad rtag tu sgrol bar byed pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rtag tu sgrol bar byed pa /
translated: It is the place that always liberates all sentient beings.

original: don yod pa'i gnas gsang zhing rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa bla na med pa'o //🔽bsod nams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i gnas /
analyzed: don yod pa'i gnas gsang zhing rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa bla na med pa'o // bsod nams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i gnas /
translated: It is the supreme place of the secret consecration of the vajra.🔽It is the place that attracts all merit.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
translated: It is the place that increases all roots of virtue.

original: 'di ni / bsod nams kyi phung po'i gnas /
analyzed: 'di ni / bsod nams kyi phung po'i gnas /
translated: This is the abode of the heap of merit,

original: chos kyi mdzod dang rtag tu mnyam pa /
analyzed: chos kyi mdzod dang rtag tu mnyam pa /
translated: the treasury of the Dharma, always equal,

original: sangs rgyas kyi mdzod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mdzod /
translated: the treasury of the Buddha,

original: mdzod chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi mdzod la mkhas pa /
analyzed: mdzod chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi mdzod la mkhas pa /
translated: the great treasury, the treasury of Avalokiteśvara, skilled in the treasury,

original: rtag tu padma'i mdzod /
analyzed: rtag tu padma'i mdzod /
translated: always the treasury of the lotus,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod /
translated: and likewise the treasury of all the tathāgatas,

original: rdo rje'i mdzod /
analyzed: rdo rje'i mdzod /
translated: the treasury of the vajra,

original: de bzhin du nor bu chen po nyid kyi mdzod /
analyzed: de bzhin du nor bu chen po nyid kyi mdzod /
translated: and likewise the treasury of the great jewel itself,

original: rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab pa /🔽mi g-yo ba /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab pa / mi g-yo ba /
translated: profound like the great ocean,🔽immovable,

original: mi 'gul ba /
analyzed: mi 'gul ba /
translated: unwavering,

original: zil gyis mi gnon pa'o //
analyzed: zil gyis mi gnon pa'o //
translated: and unassailable.

original: bdud dang / log par 'dren pa /
analyzed: bdud dang / log par 'dren pa /
translated: No māra, no guide to perversity,

original: bgegs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / srin po thams cad kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis 'jug par mi nus so //
analyzed: bgegs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / srin po thams cad kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis 'jug par mi nus so //
translated: no obstacle, no yakṣa, rākṣasa, bhūta, or piśāca can enter with a hostile mind.

original: de la mi g-yo ba'i gnas rnyed dka' zhing bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: de la mi g-yo ba'i gnas rnyed dka' zhing bla na med pa'o //
translated: There, the immovable abode is difficult to attain and unsurpassed.

original: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya ste /
translated: One should make a square maṇḍala

original: ba byung dang yang dag par ldan pa khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bya'o //
analyzed: ba byung dang yang dag par ldan pa khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bya'o //
translated: endowed with cow dung, thirty-two cubits in size.

original: yang na khru brgyad par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na khru brgyad par bya ste /
translated: Or it should be eight cubits.🔽The thread should be one and a half cubits in length.

original: de phyed dang gnyis kyi khru'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis tshad rnam par phye ste gdab par @86b bya'o; ;gra bzhi mnyam par phye ba /
analyzed: de phyed dang gnyis kyi khru'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis tshad rnam par phye ste gdab par @86b bya'o; ;gra bzhi mnyam par phye ba /
translated: The four sides should be equal,

original: logs bzhi legs par rnam par phye ba /
analyzed: logs bzhi legs par rnam par phye ba /
translated: the four corners well-defined,

original: shin tu 'jam pa /
analyzed: shin tu 'jam pa /
translated: very smooth,

original: shin tu legs par bcag pa /
analyzed: shin tu legs par bcag pa /
translated: very well-cut,

original: bsnyen la 'jam zhing brgyan pa /
analyzed: bsnyen la 'jam zhing brgyan pa /
translated: soft to the touch, and adorned.

original: sa gzhi bee d'urya'i kha dog la dkyil 'khor mdzes pa thig gis char rnam par dbye bar bya ste /
analyzed: sa gzhi bee d'urya'i kha dog la dkyil 'khor mdzes pa thig gis char rnam par dbye bar bya ste /
translated: The ground should be the color of beryl, and the beautiful maṇḍala should be divided into sections with lines.

original: sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba /
analyzed: sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba /
translated: The four gates should be well-defined.

original: skud pa la tshon sna lnga byin te dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gru bzhi par rnam par dbye'o //
analyzed: skud pa la tshon sna lnga byin te dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gru bzhi par rnam par dbye'o //
translated: The thread should be dyed five colors and divided into four sections in the center of the maṇḍala.

original: khru gnyis kyi tshad kyi re kh'a lnga rnam par dbye'o //
analyzed: khru gnyis kyi tshad kyi re kh'a lnga rnam par dbye'o //
translated: The five lines should be two cubits in length.

original: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kun nas rgyas pa bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kun nas rgyas pa bri bar bya ste /
translated: In the center of the maṇḍala, a fully blossomed thirty-two-petaled lotus should be drawn.

original: dbus kyi padma'i ge sar la don yod pa padma'i gtsug tor bya ste /
analyzed: dbus kyi padma'i ge sar la don yod pa padma'i gtsug tor bya ste /
translated: In the center of the lotus, one should draw Amoghasiddhi Uṣṇīṣa-Buddha.

original: padma phyed kha bye ba'i padma'i 'dab ma'i steng du padma la zhal gsum par bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: padma phyed kha bye ba'i padma'i 'dab ma'i steng du padma la zhal gsum par bri bar bya ste /
translated: On top of a lotus petal, which is half-open, one should draw a lotus with three faces.

original: bde ba'i gzugs dang mtshan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: bde ba'i gzugs dang mtshan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: It has a blissful form and is adorned with the major marks.

original: gtsug tor gyi rnam pa 'bar ba'i snying po la khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor gyi rnam pa 'bar ba'i snying po la khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri'o //
translated: It has the form of an uṣṇīṣa and is surrounded by a halo of blazing light.

original: gzhogs g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: gzhogs g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: On the right side, one should draw the form of Noble Avalokiteśvara, adorned with a crown of matted hair.

original: dbu la 'od dpag med 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can no //
analyzed: dbu la 'od dpag med 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can no //
translated: On his head is Amitābha, the essence of blazing light, with a body.

original: gzhogs g-yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa dang rgyan bcangs pa /
analyzed: gzhogs g-yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa dang rgyan bcangs pa /
translated: On the left side, one should draw the form of Noble Avalokiteśvara, wearing matted hair and ornaments.

original: 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus dang dbu la padma gtsug tor gyi khor yug tu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus dang dbu la padma gtsug tor gyi khor yug tu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o //
translated: He has a body with the essence of blazing light, and on his head is Uṣṇīṣa-Buddha, surrounded by a halo of various blazing light rays.🔽Outside, one should draw campaka flowers,

original: phyi rol tu tsam pa ka dang / b'arshi ka dang / @87a *//
analyzed: phyi rol tu tsam pa ka dang / b'arshi ka dang / @87a *//
translated: varṣika flowers,

original: autpa la sngon po'i me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: autpa la sngon po'i me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should tie a garland of blue lotus flowers.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i gra bzhi'i gnas rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i gra bzhi'i gnas rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste /
translated: Then, in the four corners of the mandala's center, one should draw the four great kings,

original: go cha dang / ya lad bgos pa /
analyzed: go cha dang / ya lad bgos pa /
translated: clad in armor and scale mail,

original: drag po'i gzugs can /
analyzed: drag po'i gzugs can /
translated: with fierce forms,

original: 'jigs par byed pa /
analyzed: 'jigs par byed pa /
translated: frightening,

original: 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i snying po'i lus so //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i snying po'i lus so //
translated: with bodies the essence of blazing garlands.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi re kh'a sngon ma la rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i re kh'a 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi re kh'a sngon ma la rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i re kh'a 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: On the mandala's inner line, one should draw vajras and lances with blazing lines.

original: re kh'a rim par phye ba gnyis pa la me tog gi re kh'a bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: re kh'a rim par phye ba gnyis pa la me tog gi re kh'a bri bar bya'o //
translated: On the second line, divided from the inner line, one should draw a flower line.

original: gsum pa la nor bu rin po che chen po'i skud pa re kh'a bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la nor bu rin po che chen po'i skud pa re kh'a bri bar bya'o //
translated: On the third, one should draw a line of great jewel gem threads.

original: re kh'a bzhi pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: re kh'a bzhi pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: On the fourth line, one should draw hand gestures holding various weapons.

original: re kh'a lnga pa la kha khyer gyi rnam pa bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: re kh'a lnga pa la kha khyer gyi rnam pa bri bar bya ste /
translated: On the fifth line, one should draw a parapet.

original: tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba rnam par bkra ba'o //
analyzed: tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba rnam par bkra ba'o //
translated: It is variegated with various colors.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o //
translated: Outside the maṇḍala, one should draw the various weapons, the symbolic implements.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rnams su gnod sbyin chen po bzhi bya ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rnams su gnod sbyin chen po bzhi bya ste /
translated: At the four gates of the maṇḍala, one should draw the four great yakṣas:

original: drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can /
analyzed: drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can /
translated: Rudra, with a form that is extremely wrathful,

original: mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: baring his fangs,

original: bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba /
translated: with a contorted face,

original: bum pa gang ba thogs pa /
analyzed: bum pa gang ba thogs pa /
translated: holding a full vase,

original: skra brdzes pa /
analyzed: skra brdzes pa /
translated: with disheveled hair,

original: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with all the ornaments,

original: thod pa'i cod pan can /
analyzed: thod pa'i cod pan can /
translated: with a skull crown,

original: 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can ri bo'i gdan la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can ri bo'i gdan la gnas par bya'o //
translated: with a body that is the essence of blazing light, seated on a mountain seat.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi re kh'a'i phyi rol tu @87b phreng sum 'gyur du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi re kh'a'i phyi rol tu @87b phreng sum 'gyur du bri bar bya'o //
translated: Outside the maṇḍala lines, one should draw the maṇḍala three times the size.

original: padma dang / autpa la sngon po dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / b'arshi ka dang / aa dhi mukta ka rnams rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma dang / autpa la sngon po dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / b'arshi ka dang / aa dhi mukta ka rnams rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
translated: lotus, blue lotus, champak, jasmine, vārṣika, and atimuktaka flowers.

original: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar byas nas shin tu rnam par phye ba /
analyzed: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar byas nas shin tu rnam par phye ba /
translated: Then the knowledge-mantra practitioner, having well drawn the maṇḍala, should make it very distinct,

original: shin tu mkhas pa /
analyzed: shin tu mkhas pa /
translated: very skilled,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan dang / rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan dang / rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa /
translated: beautified with a maṇḍala enclosure and four arched gateways,

original: khor yug tu mda' dang / tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re dang / dar dpyangs dang / khor yug tu bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang / gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug dang /
analyzed: khor yug tu mda' dang / tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re dang / dar dpyangs dang / khor yug tu bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang / gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug dang /
translated: all around with various colored arrows, variegated banners, parasols, victory banners, flags, canopies, and streamers, and all around sixteen full vases and sixteen bali vases,

original: de bzhin du bdug pa'i snod bcu drug dang / gzhong pa bcu drug tu rab tu brjod do //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ris thun mong ba'i tshogs bsdus pa'i sar bgrod de phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs par 'gyur te /

original: the tshom med do //
analyzed: the tshom med do //

analyzed: 'di ni / don yod pa padma gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi sngags dang phyag rgyar brjod @95a *//

original: char 'bab par byed do //
analyzed: char 'bab par byed do //
translated: It will cause rain to fall.

analyzed: me tog gi char dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub rnams mchod pa'i don du kun nas char 'bab bo //

analyzed: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po stong phrag bskyed do //
translated: He generates the great mass of merit of all the buddhas and the hosts of bodhisattvas who have gone in the three times.

original: phyag rgya de bzung pa tsam gyi skad cig de la phyag rgya gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba stong phrag bye ba'i grangs su bgrangs pa'i phyag rgya bcings par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya de bzung pa tsam gyi skad cig de la phyag rgya gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba stong phrag bye ba'i grangs su bgrangs pa'i phyag rgya bcings par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that very moment of holding that seal, as many seals as there are grains of sand in the Ganges, in the trillions, are formed.

original: ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i phung por byas te dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa so so so so la phul ba dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po thob pa'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'bras bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i phung por byas te dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa so so so so la phul ba dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po thob pa'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'bras bur 'gyur te /
translated: If one were to make a heap of the seven precious substances equal in size to Mount Meru and offer it to each of the Tathāgatas who have gone to the three times, and if one were to obtain the collection of merit of all the Victors, the result of this would be merely by forming the seal.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tshom med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tshom med do //
translated: There is no doubt that the Tathāgatas always watch day and night.

original: zhes so // phyag rgya 'di nyid las @95b g-yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyangs te rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan gcig brjod do //
analyzed: zhes so // phyag rgya 'di nyid las @95b g-yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyangs te rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan gcig brjod do //
translated: From this very seal, one should extend the right forefinger and recite the root mantra once.

original: phyag rgya 'di ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di ni /
translated: This seal is called

analyzed: don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi stobs spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po zhes bya ste /

original: thams cad du las thams cad legs par thob par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad du las thams cad legs par thob par byed do //
translated: It accomplishes all activities well everywhere.

original: phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs don yod pa dri ma med pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs don yod pa dri ma med pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Merely by forming this mudrā, one will perfect all the accumulations of merit and attain the pure and meaningful state of Avalokiteśvara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will uphold the mudrā of the essence of the pure vision of all the tathāgatas.

analyzed: sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All fears of evil, lower realms, and downfall will be pacified.

analyzed: phyag rgya 'di bzung ba tsam dang / dang po bcings ba tsam gyis ri rab chen po ltar 'gyur te /
translated: Merely by holding this mudrā, merely by forming it for the first time, one will become like the great Mount Sumeru.

analyzed: bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis mi 'gul zhing mi g-yo la zil gyis mi non yang 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be unshakable, unmoving, and invincible to all māras, obstructors, and so forth, to all bhūtas, piśācas, yakṣas, and rākṣasas.

original: phyir rgol pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad nas yongs su grol lo //

original: snying po yi ge gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa yin la /
analyzed: snying po yi ge gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa yin la /
translated: He is the one who has entered the one syllable essence.

original: phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / dam tshig gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin no; ;don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'di ni /
